page.title: Chargers Edge Broncos, 20-17 (AP)
page.text: AP - The Chargers #151; yes, the Chargers #151; took firm control of the AFC West by hanging on to beat the Denver Broncos 20-17 in a wild one on Sunday. LaDainian Tomlinson ran for two touchdowns and San Diego's defense saved the day by intercepting Jake Plummer four times, including in the end zone in the closing minutes.
